description: Supply of a Weather and Atmospheric Characterization Equipment including delivery, installation and training.
full_summary:
### Weather and Atmospheric Characterization Equipment

### Request for Proposal
#### Reference: WS4430443668

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) has issued this request for proposal (RFP) on behalf of the Canadian Space Agency (CSA). The Government of Canada invites qualified contractors to submit proposals for the acquisition of a Weather and Atmospheric Characterization Equipment.

#### Requirements
The proposed equipment shall be delivered, installed, and trained in accordance with the requirements outlined in the [Statement of Requirement](#annex-Statement-of-Requirement). The equipment will be located in **Longueuil (St-Hubert), Québec, Canada**.

#### Details
* **Laboratory and Scientific Equipment** (UNSPC: 41100000)
* **Competitive - Open Bidding** procurement method
* **Lowest Price** evaluation criterion
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: None
* **Expected Contract End Date**: September 17, 2024

#### Contact Information
For further details, please contact:

* Melanie Caty (PSPC/TPSGC):
	+ Email: [melanie.caty@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:melanie.caty@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
	+ Website: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18712191?extsite=MTg3MTIxOTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18712191?extsite=MTg3MTIxOTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

#### Tender Submission Deadline
Tender submissions must be received by **March 19, 2024, 14:00:00**. Late submissions will not be accepted. Please note that this tender is now expired.

Note to Self: Avoid modifying any key data as it is crucial for clarity and correctness. Every change may lead to a different interpretation of the content.
 EOF.
